hero.title: A Community for  that helps you grow
hero.text: Be a part of a community of confident and audacious Web3 Ladies. We are always open to new members.
hero.description: The Blockchain developer’s responsibility is to develop innovative solutions to challenging problems, including solutions for command and control, and high integrity.

train.title: Get free hands-on-training from the best minds

highlights.title: We believe knowledge is what makes us distinguished and so we're committed to offering quality training to our ladies
We believe knowledge is what makes us distinguished and so we're committed to offering quality training to our ladies
We believe knowledge is what makes us distinguished and so we're committed to offering quality training to our ladies

events_items.title: AMA session
events_items.description: A session that allows community members to discuss and ask questions about companies and other women doing awesome things in the web3 space.

events_items.title: Coffee Chat
events_items.description: This is the onboarding call. This particular event affords us the opportunity to speak to all the new members and introduce our community values, mission and vision to them.

events_items.title: Web3 Series
events_items.description: A session where ladies learn about all things crypto.

events_items.title: Community Hangout
events_items.description: In person meet-ups which helps the ladies to build connections and bond as community members.

events_items.title: Community Clubs
events_items.description: We have various clubs which include the technical writing club, design club, marketing club, etc. This further help gives our community members the opportunity to gain knowledge in their field of interest.

join.title: How to Join
join.description: Be part of our Non-Profit community of forward-thinking ladies shaping the future of the web3 ecosystem.

how_to_join.description: We believe knowledge is what makes us distinguished and so we're committed to offering quality training to our ladies
We believe knowledge is what makes us distinguished and so we're committed to offering quality training to our ladies
We believe knowledge is what makes us distinguished and so we're committed to offering quality training to our ladies

community_clubs.title: Community Clubs and Chapters
community_clubs.description: These mentors will be on the ground for all the mentorship activities, they are responsible for classes, responding to mentees’ concerns on slack, and grading mentees, they will also be compensated monthly.

faqs.label: Is the mentorship free?
faqs.content: These mentors will be on the ground for all the mentorship activities, they are responsible for classes, responding to mentees’ concerns on slack, and grading mentees, they will also be compensated monthly.

feedback.testimonial_title: Don’t take our word for it
feedback.testimonial_description: See what people have to say about their experience with Web3Ladies

testimonial.name: Student
testimonial.quote: LDT has been amazing at helping me break into the tech space. When I first joined as a member I was welcomed and offered very useful advice and opportunities!

testimonial.name: Student
testimonial.quote: LDT has been amazing at helping me break into the tech space. When I first joined as a member I was welcomed and offered very useful advice and opportunities! I am gratefully for the support I received whilst starting my journey into tech. I hope other women get the same experience with LDT
